about.title: About me
about.mainText: Hey! I'm Velizar, a front-end developer from Erwitte, with a real passion for coding and design. I've been fascinated by computers and their technology since I was a kid, and now I've turned my hobby into my profession.
about.subTextOne: During my training at the Developer Academy, I not only learned but also gained a lot of practical experience, whether through my projects or successful teamwork. I am particularly interested in implementing designs precisely and paying attention to every detail.
about.subTextTwo: If you are curious, please take a look at my previous work to get an impression of my dedication and skills. I cordially invite you to take a look at my portfolio.

skills.title: My skills
skills.text: Through working on a variety of projects, I have been able to continuously expand and refine my knowledge and skills in front-end development. This includes the use of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript as well as modern frameworks such as Angular

portfolioMain.subTitle: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

portfolioItem.description0: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and dropfunctions, assign users and categories.
portfolioItem.description1: A simple jump-and-run game with an object-oriented approach. Assist Pepe in collecting coins and salsa bottles to combat the killer chicken.

contact.title: Contact
contact.question: Got a problem to solve?
contact.text: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact.name: Your name
contact.checkboxT: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
